tagitem.name: CI_CONDITIONAL_ADDON_CONTROL_1
tagitem.desc: Specifies the conditions (base label type and first three digits) in which a specific addon type is required.
tagitem.notes:
If a base label is decoded that matches the configured base label type and digits of a CI_CONDITIONAL_ADDON_CONTROL entry, the configured addon type is also required to be decoded before the base label and addon are transmitted.
This value has 4 fields, 1 nibble each. The most significant nibble is Nibble [0]. The least significant nibble is Nibble [3].
Nibbles [0] [1] [2] are used to specify the first 3 digits of the base label. Nibble [3] specifies the base label type and also the type of addon that is required.
Values for Nibbles [0] [1] [2] may be 0x0 - 0x9; 0xF = do not care; 0xA - 0xE = indeterminate results.
Conditional addon settings are considered by the scanner before optional addon settings (CI_ENABLE_OPTIONAL...). If a decoded base label does not match any of the CI_CONDITIONAL_ADDON_CONTROL entries, the scanner will then check for applicable optional addon settings.
For situations where a decoded base label matches more than one CI_CONDITIONAL_ADDON_CONTROL entry, the scanner will require just one addon type from the matching CI_CONDITIONAL_ADDON_CONTROL entries.

tagitem.name: CI_CONDITIONAL_ADDON_CONTROL_2
tagitem.desc: Specifies the conditions (base label type and first three digits) in which a specific addon type is required.
tagitem.notes: See notes for CI_CONDITIONAL_ADDON_CONTROL_1

tagitem.name: CI_CONDITIONAL_ADDON_CONTROL_3
tagitem.desc: Specifies the conditions (base label type and first three digits) in which a specific addon type is required.
tagitem.notes: See notes for CI_CONDITIONAL_ADDON_CONTROL_1

tagitem.name: CI_CONDITIONAL_ADDON_CONTROL_4
tagitem.desc: Specifies the conditions (base label type and first three digits) in which a specific addon type is required.
tagitem.notes: See notes for CI_CONDITIONAL_ADDON_CONTROL_1

tagitem.name: CI_ENABLE_OPTIONAL_P2
tagitem.desc: Enables optional P2 add-ons.
tagitem.notes:
If a UPC/EAN base label and a P2 addon are both decoded, the scanner will transmit the base label and addon. If a UPC/EAN base label is decoded without an addon, the base label will be transmitted without an addon. See CI_OPTIONAL_ADDON_TIMER and CI_P2_ADDON_MINIMUM_READ for additional information.
Please note that conditional addons settings (CI_CONDITIONAL_ADDON...) are considered by the scanner before optional addon settings.

tagitem.name: CI_ENABLE_OPTIONAL_P5
tagitem.desc: Enables optional P5 add-ons.
tagitem.notes:
If a UPC/EAN base label and a P5 addon are both decoded, the scanner will transmit the base label and addon. If a UPC/EAN base label is decoded without an addon, the base label will be transmitted without an addon. See CI_OPTIONAL_ADDON_TIMER and CI_P5_ADDON_MINIMUM_READ for additional information.
Please note that conditional addons settings (CI_CONDITIONAL_ADDON...) are considered by the scanner before optional addon settings.

tagitem.name: CI_OPTIONAL_ADDON_TIMER
tagitem.desc: Sets the time the scanner will look for an addon when an add-on fragment has been seen and optional add-ons are enabled.
tagitem.notes: The "normal" setting for this configuration item is 0x07 (70 milliseconds). To enable optional addons, see CI_ENABLE_OPTIONAL_P2, CI_ENABLE_OPTIONAL_P5.

tagitem.name: CI_ALL_AIM_ID_ENABLE
tagitem.desc: Enables/disables adding AIM IDs for all code types.
tagitem.notes: When disabled, AIM IDs can be enabled for individual codes with CI_code_AIM_ID_ENABLE. Please note CI_EAN128_AIM _ID_ENABLE is enabled by default.

tagitem.notes: The label ID is 3 bytes. The 3 bytes are characters for the label ID. A 00 (hex) value in the first 3 bytes indicates the end of the label ID characters. Anker Plessey is enabled through the Plessey check digit calculation.

tagitem.name: CI_LABEL_ID_UPCA_COMPOSITE
tagitem.desc: Specifies UPCA Composite label ID to be added to label data
tagitem.notes: The label ID is 3 bytes. The 3 bytes are characters for the label ID. A 00 (hex) value in the first 3 bytes indicates the end of the label ID characters.

tagitem.notes: Effective only when CI_ALL_AIM_ID_ENABLE is disabled. Anker Plessey is enabled through the Plessey check digit calculation.

tagitem.name: CI_AZTEC_LENGTH_2
tagitem.desc: Specifies one of the digits Label lengths for Aztec length control.

values.value: Ignore this length. Only one fixed length.

tagitem.notes: Length 2 is the maximum label length if in variable length mode, or the second fixed length if in fixed length mode. Length includes the barcodes check and data characters

tagitem.name: CI_AZTEC_LENGTH_CONTROL
tagitem.desc: Specifies either variable-length decoding or fixed-length decoding for Aztec .

tagitem.name: CI_GOOD_READ_BEEP_FREQUENCY
tagitem.desc: Specifies good-read beep frequency

tagitem.name: CI_GOOD_READ_WHEN_TO_INDICATE
tagitem.desc: Specifies when to indicate to user that label has been successfully read

values.value: After CTS goes inactive then active

tagitem.notes:
Mode 2 applies to RS232 STD and RS232 WN only. If set to mode 2 in other interfaces, mode 0 will be assumed. Mode 1 - for scanner with intelligent integrated EAS, label transmission (and hence good read beep) is completed after EAS logic executes
Note: This tag is not applied for cordless device as Orion. Not sure about Marco Polo and Columbus

tagitem.name: CI_GOOD_READ_BEEP_LENGTH
tagitem.desc: Specifies good-read beep duration
tagitem.notes: Times have a tolerance of 15%

tagitem.name: CI_BEEP_ON_NOT_ON_FILE
tagitem.desc: Enables/disables ability of scanner to cause beep to be sounded on receiving not-on-file (NOF) host command

tagitem.name: CI_POWERUP_BEEP_CONTROL
tagitem.desc: Specifies type of audible indication that is made when entering scanner-active mode on powerup.

tagitem.name: CI_GOOD_READ_BEEP_TYPE
tagitem.desc: Specifies the type of good read beep

tagitem.name: CI_GOOD_READ_BEEP_VOLUME
tagitem.desc: Specifies good-read beep volume

tagitem.name: CI_RF_BATCH_MODE
tagitem.desc: Specifies which mode to use to store labels in the Handheld while disconnected from the Base
tagitem.notes: When disabled the HH will not batch labels. In Auto mode, the HH will store labels to RAM when the HH goes out of range and is disconnected from the remote device. In Manual mode, the HH will always store labels to Flash memory. The user must manually send the stored labels to the remote device using a special "batch send" label.

tagitem.name: CI_RF_BEEP_VOLUME
tagitem.desc: Beep volume of the radio specific beep indications

tagitem.name: CI_BT_CRADLE_BEEP_ENABLE
tagitem.desc: Enables/disables the beep that indicates Handheld has been placed in the cradle.

tagitem.name: CI_RF_AUTO_CONFIG_UPDATE
tagitem.desc: Enables/disables the ability of the Handheld and Base station to automatically update config of the remote device when the config CRCs are different, or when the Handheld exits Label Programming mode.

tagitem.name: CI_BT_DISCONNECT_BEEP
tagitem.desc: Enables/disables the disconnect beep indication.
tagitem.notes: The disconnect beep indication at startup is not under control of the config item. It is always heard.

tagitem.name: CI_RF_DIRECT_LINK_ENABLE
tagitem.desc: Enables/disables the ability to link a Radio HH to a cradle without scanning the Unlink label first.

tagitem.name: CI_RF_PAGING_ENABLE
tagitem.desc: Enables/disables the ability of the base station to search linked hand held.

tagitem.name: CI_RF_AUTO_FLASH_UPDATE
tagitem.desc: Enables/disables auto flash update in a Bluetooth scanner

tagitem.name: CI_BT_LEASH_MODE_BEEP
tagitem.desc: Specifies the number of seconds to sound the Leash Mode beep when the Handheld goes out of range.
tagitem.notes: A setting of 00 disables the Leash mode beep. The beep occurs 3 times per second.

tagitem.name: CI_RF_BATCH_TX_DELAY
tagitem.desc: Specifies delay between transmitting labels stored in batch memory
tagitem.notes: value 00 = no delay

values.value: Ignore this length. Only one fixed length.

tagitem.notes: For variable length decoding, minimum and maximum lengths may be set. For fixed length decoding, two different explicit lengths may be set.

tagitem.name: CI_CODE39_AIM_ID_ENABLE
tagitem.desc: Enables/Disables AIM ID for Code 39
tagitem.notes: Effective only when CI_ALL_AIM_ID_ENABLE is disabled.

tagitem.name: CI_CODE39_CHECK_CHARACTER_CALCULATION
tagitem.desc: Enables/disables calculation and verification of optional Code39 check character
tagitem.notes:
Range = 00-0x1f by 01
00=Disable
Bit values 01=Enable Standard check 02=Enable Mod-7 check 04=Enable Italian Post check 08=Enable Daimer Chrysler check
When disabled, any check character in label is treated as a data character
In same case the configuration of Code 39 with 01=Enable Standard check gets

tagitem.name: CI_CODE39_CHECK_CHARACTER_TRANSMISSION
tagitem.desc: Enables/disables transmission of optional Code39 check character

tagitem.name: CI_CODE39_ENABLE
tagitem.desc: Enables/disables ability of scanner to decode Code39 labels

tagitem.name: CI_CODE39_FULL_ASCII
tagitem.desc:
In Code39 decoding, this enables/disables the translation of Code39 characters to Code39 full-ASCII characters.
In the Wand Emulation interface, this enables/disables the Code39 full-ASCII encoding scheme for Code39 labels.

tagitem.name: CI_LABEL_ID_CODE39
tagitem.desc: Specifies Code39 label ID to be added to label data
tagitem.notes: The label ID is 3 bytes. The 3 bytes are characters for the label ID. A 00 (hex) value in the first 3 bytes indicates the end of the label ID characters.

tagitem.name: CI_CODE39_LENGTH_1
tagitem.desc: Specifies one of the barcode lengths for Code39 length control.
tagitem.notes: Length 1 is the minimum label length if in variable length mode, or the first fixed length if in fixed length mode. Length includes the barcodes check, data, and full-ASCII shift characters. The length does not include start/stop characters.

tagitem.name: CI_CODE39_LENGTH_2
tagitem.desc: Specifies one of the barcode lengths for Code39 length control.

values.value: Ignore this length. Only one fixed length.

tagitem.notes: Length 2 is the maximum label length if in variable length mode, or the second fixed length if in fixed length mode. Length includes the barcodes check, data, and full-ASCII shift characters. The length does not include start/stop characters.

tagitem.name: CI_CODE39_LENGTH_CONTROL
tagitem.desc: Specifies either variable-length decoding or fixed-length decoding for Code39
tagitem.notes: For variable-length decoding, a minimum and maximum length may be set. For fixed-length decoding, two different lengths may be set.

tagitem.name: CI_CODE39_QUIET_ZONE
tagitem.desc: Specifies the number of quiet zones for Code 39

values.value: Small quiet zones on two sides
Small quiet zones on two sides
Small quiet zones on two sides
Small quiet zones on two sides
Small quiet zones on two sides

tagitem.notes: 2D HH Value Options Mapping: 02=Quiet zones on two sides 03=00=01=04=05=Small quiet zones on two sides

tagitem.name: CI_CODE39_START_STOP_CHARACTER_TRANSMISSION
tagitem.desc: Enables/disables transmission of Code39 start and stop characters

tagitem.notes: Effective only when CI_ALL_AIM_ID_ENABLE is disabled.

tagitem.desc: Enables/disables expansion of Code128 labels to Code39.
tagitem.notes: When enabled, the label identifier for a code128 shall be set to Code39 and all Code39 formatting control shall be applied to the label.

tagitem.name: CI_CODE128_CHECK_CHARACTER_TRANSMISSION
tagitem.desc: Enables/Disables transmission of the Code128 check chatacter

tagitem.name: CI_CODE128_ENABLE
tagitem.desc: Enables/disables ability of scanner to decode Code128 labels

tagitem.name: CI_LABEL_ID_CODE128
tagitem.desc: Specifies Code128 label ID to be added to label data
tagitem.notes: The label ID is 3 bytes. The 3 bytes are characters for the label ID. A 00 (hex) value in the first 3 bytes indicates the end of the label ID characters.

tagitem.name: CI_CODE128_LENGTH_1
tagitem.desc: Specifies one of the barcode lengths for Code128 length control.
tagitem.notes:
Length 1 is the minimum label length if in variable length mode, or the first fixed length if in fixed length mode. Length includes the barcodes data characters only.
MLD (Orion decoder) Notes:
It is the minimum number of barcode characters (function codes + decoded data, C-set character are counted twice, + start a + check digit with the exclusion of the stop character) if variable length is set, otherwise it is fixed length 1

tagitem.name: CI_CODE128_LENGTH_2
tagitem.desc: Specifies one of the barcode lengths for Code128 length control.

values.value: Ignore this length. Only one fixed length.

tagitem.notes:
Length 2 is the maximum label length if in variable length mode, or the second fixed length if in fixed length mode. Length includes the barcodes data characters only.
MLD (Orion decoder) Notes:
It is the maximum number of barcode characters (function codes + decoded data, C-set character are counted twice, + start a + check digit with the exclusion of the stop character) if variable length is set, otherwise it is fixed length 2

tagitem.name: CI_CODE128_LENGTH_CONTROL
tagitem.desc: Specifies either variable-length decoding or fixed-length decoding for Code128
tagitem.notes: For variable-length decoding, a minimum length may be set; for fixed-length decoding, two different lengths may be set

tagitem.name: CI_CODE128_TRANSMIT_FUNCTION_CHARS
tagitem.desc: Enables/disables transmission of Code128 function characters 1, 2, 3, and 4
tagitem.notes: Disabled is recommended setting for all interfaces except Wand Emulation.

tagitem.name: CI_CODE93_AIM_ID_ENABLE
tagitem.desc: Enables/Disables AIM ID for Code 93
tagitem.notes: Effective only when CI_ALL_AIM_ID_ENABLE is disabled.

tagitem.name: CI_CODE93_CHECK_CHARACTER_CALCULATION
tagitem.desc: Enables/Disables calculation and verification of optional Code 93 check character

tagitem.name: CI_CODE93_CHECK_CHARACTER_TRANSMISSION
tagitem.desc: Enables/disables transmission of optional Code 93 check character

tagitem.name: CI_CODE93_ENABLE
tagitem.desc: Enables/disables ability of scanner to decode Code93 labels

tagitem.name: CI_LABEL_ID_CODE93
tagitem.desc: Specifies Code93 label ID to be added to label data
tagitem.notes: The label ID is 3 bytes. The 3 bytes are characters for the label ID. A 00 (hex) value in the first 3 bytes indicates the end of the label ID characters.

tagitem.name: CI_CODE93_LENGTH_1
tagitem.desc: Specifies one of the barcode lengths for Code93 length control.
tagitem.notes: Length 1 is the minimum label length if in variable length mode, or the first fixed length if in fixed length mode. Length includes the barcodes data characters only.

tagitem.name: CI_CODE93_LENGTH_2
tagitem.desc: Specifies one of the barcode lengths for Code93 length control.

values.value: Ignore this length. Only one fixed length.

tagitem.notes: Length 2 is the maximum label length if in variable length mode, or the second fixed length if in fixed length mode. Length includes the barcodes data characters only.

tagitem.name: CI_CODE93_LENGTH_CONTROL
tagitem.desc: Specifies either variable-length decoding or fixed-length decoding for Code93
tagitem.notes: For variable-length decoding, a minimum length may be set; for fixed-length decoding, two different lengths may be set

tagitem.name: CI_ABC_CODABAR_CONCATENATE_ENABLE
tagitem.desc: Enables/Disables ability of scanner to decode ABC Codabar labels.

tagitem.name: CI_CODABAR_AIM_ID_ENABLE
tagitem.desc: Enables/Disables AIM ID for Codabar
tagitem.notes: Effective only when CI_ALL_AIM_ID_ENABLE is disabled.

tagitem.name: CI_CODABAR_CHECK_CHARACTER_CALCULATION
tagitem.desc: Enables/disables calculation and verification of optional Codabar check character
tagitem.notes:
00=Disable
Bit values 01=Enable AIM standard check char 02=Enable Modulo 10 check char 03=Enable NW-7
When disabled, any check characters in label are treated as data characters.

tagitem.name: CI_ABC_CODABAR_CONCATENATION_MODE
tagitem.desc: Specifies the concatenation mode between Static and Dynamic.

tagitem.name: CI_CODABAR_CHECK_CHARACTER_TRANSMISSION
tagitem.desc: Enables/disables transmission of optional Codabar check character
tagitem.notes: Applies when CI_CODABAR_CHECK_CHARACTER_CALCULATION is enabled.

tagitem.name: CI_ABC_CODABAR_DYNAMIC_CONCATENATION_TIMEOUT
tagitem.desc: Specifies the timeout in 10-millisecond ticks used by the ABC Codabar Dynamic Concatenation Mode.

tagitem.name: CI_CODABAR_ENABLE
tagitem.desc: Enables/disables ability of scanner to decode Codabar labels

tagitem.name: CI_ABC_CODABAR_FORCE_CONCATENATION_ENABLE
tagitem.desc: Forces labels starting or ending with D to be concatenated

tagitem.name: CI_LABEL_ID_CODABAR
tagitem.desc: Specifies Codabar label ID to be added to label data
tagitem.notes: The label ID is 3 bytes. The 3 bytes are characters for the label ID. A 00 (hex) value in the first 3 bytes indicates the end of the label ID characters.

tagitem.name: CI_CODABAR_LENGTH_1
tagitem.desc: Specifies one of the barcode lengths for Codabar length control.
tagitem.notes: Length 1 is the minimum label length if in variable length mode, or the first fixed length if in fixed length mode. Length includes the barcodes start, stop, check and data characters. The length must include at least one data character.

tagitem.name: CI_CODABAR_LENGTH_2
tagitem.desc: Specifies one of the barcode lengths for Codabar length control.

values.value: Ignore this length. Only one fixed length.

tagitem.notes: Length 2 is the maximum label length if in variable length mode, or the second fixed length if in fixed length mode. Length includes the barcodes start, stop, check and data characters. The length must include at least one data character.

tagitem.name: CI_CODABAR_LENGTH_CONTROL
tagitem.desc: Specifies either variable-length decoding or fixed-length decoding for Codabar
tagitem.notes: For variable-length decoding, a minimum length may be set; for fixed-length decoding, two different lengths may be set

tagitem.name: CI_CODABAR_START_STOP_CHARACTER_SET
tagitem.desc: Specifies format of transmitted Codabar start/stop characters

tagitem.name: CI_CODABAR_START_STOP_CHARACTER_MATCH
tagitem.desc: Enables/disables requirement that start and stop characters match

tagitem.name: CI_CODABAR_START_STOP_CHARACTER_TRANSMISSION

tagitem.name: CI_CODE39_CIP_AIM_ID_ENABLE

tagitem.name: CI_UCC_COMPOSITE_OPTIONAL_TIMER

values.value: Allow all coupon barcodes to be decoded
Enable only GS1 Databar coupon decoding

tagitem.name: CI_CHINA_SENSIBLE_CODE_AIM_ID_ENABLE

tagitem.name: CI_CHINA_SENSIBLE_CODE_LENGTH_2

values.value: Ignore this length. Only one fixed length.

tagitem.notes: Length 2 is the maximum label length if in variable length mode, or the second fixed length if in fixed length mode. Length includes the barcodes data characters only

tagitem.name: CI_CHINA_SENSIBLE_CODE_LENGTH_CONTROL

tagitem.name: CI_LABEL_ID_TRIOPTIC

tagitem.name: CI_STRUCTURED_APPEND_ENABLE
tagitem.desc: Enables/disables ability of scanner to append multiple 2D Codes labels in a structured format
tagitem.notes:
The structured append property is globally applied to the following symbologies, if these are enabled:
- Datamatrix - QR Code - Aztec - Maxicode - PDF 417 (Also called MacroPDF) - Micro PDF (Also called MacroPDF)

tagitem.name: CI_2D_MAX_DECODING_TIME
tagitem.desc: Maximum amount of time the software will spend attempting to decode a label.

tagitem.name: CI_DEBUG_MODE
tagitem.desc: Enables/disables scanner "debug mode" (condition in which scanner reads labels, indicates reads, then discards data)
tagitem.notes: Hidden Item, used for development only

tagitem.name: CI_TEST_CONFIGURATION_MASK_1
tagitem.desc: This configuration items allows certain testing features to be enabled or disabled.
tagitem.notes:
This allows software test the ability to control certain operation in the scanner for testing purposes only. The default value of this configuration item as built is zero.
Hidden Item, used for development only
Bit 0 : 0 = no beeper indication on service mode entry; 1 = beeper indicatin on service mode entry Bit 1 : Reserved Bit 2 : 1=disable trigger debounce logic, 0=enable trigger debounce logic Bit 3 : Don't reset on Link label Bit 4 : 1=20ms high pulse generated on laser pointer control line at reset Bit 5 : Reserved Bit 6 : 1= Statistics update every 2 sec Bit 7 : 1= override powerup beep sequence with warbling beep

tagitem.name: CI_TEST_CONFIGURATION_MASK_2
tagitem.desc: Config item to allow software test to put device under test into specific mode.
tagitem.notes:
Hidden Item, used for development only
Bit 0: 1=10 second ticks for CI_POWER_DOWN_TIMEOUT setting, 0=10 minute ticks Bit 1: Disable label retry logic Bit 2: base connectable when unlinked Bit 3: 0=base made connectable on link attempt, 1=base made discoverable on link attempt

tagitem.name: CI_TEST_CONFIGURATION_MASK_3
tagitem.desc: Config item to allow software test to put device under test into specific mode.
tagitem.notes:
Hidden Item, used for development only
Bit 0 : If set, the contact fault indication is enabled.
Bits 1-7: Unused
NOTE: The configuration setting is programmable both via host interface and programming label.

tagitem.name: CI_DATAMATRIX_AIM_ID_ENABLE
tagitem.desc: Enables/Disables AIM ID for Datamatrix
tagitem.notes: Effective only when CI_ALL_AIM_ID_ENABLE is disabled.

tagitem.name: CI_DATAMATRIX_DIMENSIONS_MASK
tagitem.desc: Specifies the options available when reading Datamatrix with different form factors.
tagitem.notes:
A common use in Datamatrix decoding control requires the programming of one of this options:
String Values USER Option Values
0x3FFF0BDF = Square Style 0x0000F420 = Rectangular Style 0x3FFFFFFF = Both Square and Rectangular Style
More programming options can be available for certain specific applications and advanced users.
The deatails of whole option set is described in SRS.

tagitem.name: CI_DATAMATRIX_ENABLE

tagitem.desc: Specifies UPCE Composite label ID to be added to label data

tagitem.notes: If add-on information is present on the base label prior to the conversion taking place, the addon information will be appended to the converted GTIN label.

tagitem.name: CI_LABEL_ID_GTIN

tagitem.name: CI_GOOD_PLACE_INDICATION

tagitem.notes:
The led colour indication is product based and implemnted within:
Blue Led for BT HH Red Led for RF Star HH

tagitem.name: CI_I2OF5_CIP_HR_AIM_ID_ENABLE
tagitem.desc: Enable/Disables AMI ID for I2of5 CIP HR
tagitem.notes: Effective only when CI_ALL_AIM_ID_ENABLE is disabled

tagitem.name: CI_LABEL_ID_I2OF5_CIP_HR
tagitem.desc: Specifies I2of5 CIP HR label ID to be added to label data
tagitem.notes: The label ID is 3 bytes. The 3 bytes are characters for the label ID. A 00 (hex) value in the first 3 bytes indicates the end of the label ID characters.

tagitem.name: CI_I2OF5_AIM_ID_ENABLE
tagitem.desc: Enables/Disables AIM ID for I2of5
tagitem.notes: Effective only when CI_ALL_AIM_ID_ENABLE is disabled.

tagitem.name: CI_I2OF5_CHECK_CHARACTER_CALCULATION
tagitem.desc: Enables/disables calculation and verification of optional Interleaved 2-of-5 check character
tagitem.notes:
00=Disable
Bit values 01=Check Standard (Modulo 10) 02=Check German Parcel 04=Check DHL 08=Check Daimler Chrysler 10=Check Bosch 20=Check Italian Post
Any combination of the check character types can be enabled at the same time by setting the appropriate bits of the value.
When disabled, any check character in label is treated as a data character

tagitem.name: CI_I2OF5_CHECK_CHARACTER_TRANSMISSION
tagitem.desc: Enables/disables transmission of optional Interleaved 2-of-5 check character
tagitem.notes: Applies when CI_I2OF5_CHECK_CHARACTER_CALCULATION is enabled.

tagitem.notes: The label ID is 3 bytes. The 3 bytes are characters for the label ID. A 00 (hex) value in the first 3 bytes indicates the end of the label ID characters.

tagitem.name: CI_I2OF5_LENGTH_1
tagitem.desc: Specifies one of the barcode lengths for Interleaved 2-of-5 length control.
tagitem.notes: Length 1 is the minimum label length if in variable length mode, or the first fixed length if in fixed length mode. Length includes the barcodes check and data characters.

tagitem.name: CI_I2OF5_LENGTH_2
tagitem.desc: Specifies one of the barcode lengths for Interleaved 2-of-5 length control.

values.value: Ignore this length. Only one fixed length.

tagitem.notes: Length 2 is the maximum label length if in variable length mode, or the second fixed length if in fixed length mode. Length includes the barcodes check and data characters.

tagitem.name: CI_I2OF5_LENGTH_CONTROL
tagitem.desc: Specifies either variable-length decoding or fixed-length decoding for Interleaved 2-of-5
tagitem.notes: For variable-length decoding, a minimum length may be set; for fixed-length decoding, two different lengths may be set. Software for variable-length decoding will check both minimum and maximum length.

tagitem.name: CI_ISBT128_CONCAT_AIM_ID_ENABLE
tagitem.desc: Enables/Disables AIM ID for Concatenated ISBT128
tagitem.notes: Effective only when CI_ALL_AIM_ID_ENABLE is disabled.

tagitem.name: CI_ISBT128_CONCATENATE_ENABLE
tagitem.desc: Enables/disables ISBT128 concatenation of 2 labels
tagitem.notes:
Use the Datalogic Aladdin Configuration Application or contact Customer Support to set up pairs of label types for concatenation.
See ISBT 128 Concatenate Pair 0-15 configuration items to set up the concatenation pairs.

tagitem.name: CI_ISBT128_CONCATENATION_MODE
tagitem.desc: Specifies the concatenation mode between Static and Dynamic.

tagitem.name: CI_ISBT128_DYNAMIC_CONCATENATION_TIMEOUT
tagitem.desc: Specifies the timeout in 10-millisecond ticks used by the ISBT Dynamic Concatenation Mode.

tagitem.name: CI_ISBT128_FORCE_CONCATENATION

tagitem.notes: See ISBT 128 Concatenate Pair 0-15 configuration items to set up the concatenation pairs.

tagitem.name: CI_LABEL_ID_ISBT128_CONCAT
tagitem.desc: Specifies Concatenated ISBT128 label ID to be added to label data
tagitem.notes: The label ID is 3 bytes. The 3 bytes are characters for the label ID. A 00 (hex) value in the first 3 bytes indicates the end of the label ID characters.

tagitem.name: CI_ISBT128_CONCATENATE_LIST_ADD0
tagitem.desc: Sets a pair of label identifiers for ISBT 128 concatenation.
tagitem.notes:
Each ISBT128 Identifier has an associated value listed in the table below. The first byte of this configuration item identifies the left ISBT128 label identifier. The second byte of this configuration item identifies the right ISBT 128 label identifier.
Example 1: The left label of a pair starts with &>. The right label of a pair starts with =]. Set the configuration item to 041E to set up the pair.
Example 2: The left label of a pair starts with &{. The right label of a pair starts with =<. Set the configuration item to 1607 to set up the pair.
Set the value to 0x0000 when not using this pair.
Value ISBT ID ID Description 0x00 Unused pair Do not use this pair 0x01 =A-N P-Z 1-9 (DONATION ID) 0x02 =% (BLOOD GROUP) 0x03 => (EXP DATE) 0x04 &> (EXP DATE TIME) 0x05 =* (DONATION DATE) 0x06 &* (DONATION DATE TIME) 0x07 =< (PRODUCT CODE) 0x08 =; (DONOR ID) 0x09 =) (MANUFACTURER ID) 0x0A &) (MANUFACTURER LOT) 0x0B =' (STAFF MEMBER ID) 0x0C &< (NAT PRODUCT CODE) 0x0D &( (NAT TESTING) 0x0E &a-z (NAT USE BARCODE) 0x0F &! (NAT CUE STATUS) 0x10 &; (NAT DONOR ID) 0x11 =} (PRODUCTION DATE) 0x12 &} (PRODUCTION DATE TIME) 0x13 ={ (RED BLOOD CELL ANTIGENS) 0x14 =\ (RED BLOOD CELL ANTIGENS GENERAL) 0x15 &\ (RED BLOOD CELL ANTIGENS FINNISH) 0x16 &{ (PLATELET HLA) 0x17 =[ (HLA A AND B ALLELES) 0x18 =" (HLA DRB1 ALLELES) 0x19 =- (MANUFACTURER OTHER THAN CONTAINERS) 0x1A &- (LOT NUMBER) 0x1B =+ (COMPOUND MESSAGE) 0x1C =# (PATIENT DATE OF BIRTH) 0x1D &# (PATIENT ID) 0x1E =] (EXP MONTH YEAR) 0x1F &" (INFECTIOUS MARKERS)

tagitem.name: CI_ISBT128_CONCATENATE_LIST_ADD1
tagitem.desc: Sets a pair of label identifiers for ISBT 128 concatenation.
tagitem.notes: see ISBT 128 Concatenate Pair 0

tagitem.name: CI_ISBT128_CONCATENATE_LIST_ADD2
tagitem.desc: Sets a pair of label identifiers for ISBT 128 concatenation.
tagitem.notes: see ISBT 128 Concatenate Pair 0

tagitem.notes: see ISBT 128 Concatenate Pair 0

tagitem.name: CI_ISBT128_CONCATENATE_LIST_ADD8
tagitem.desc: Sets a pair of label identifiers for ISBT 128 concatenation.
tagitem.notes: see ISBT 128 Concatenate Pair 0

tagitem.name: CI_ISBT128_CONCATENATE_LIST_ADD9
tagitem.desc: Sets a pair of label identifiers for ISBT 128 concatenation.
tagitem.notes: see ISBT 128 Concatenate Pair 0

tagitem.name: CI_ISBT128_CONCATENATE_LIST_ADDA
tagitem.desc: Sets a pair of label identifiers for ISBT 128 concatenation.
tagitem.notes: see ISBT 128 Concatenate Pair 0

tagitem.name: CI_ISBT128_CONCATENATE_LIST_ADDB
tagitem.desc: Sets a pair of label identifiers for ISBT 128 concatenation.
tagitem.notes: see ISBT 128 Concatenate Pair 0
